summary: A wealthy business man, out of touch with real folks, decides to mingle and see what it is really all about.
cast: Robert Young|Frank Morgan|Mary Astor|Florence Rice|Edna May Oliver|Reginald Owen|Herman Bing|Henry Hull|Sig Ruman|Walter Kingsford|Mariska Aldrich|Clarence Badger Jr.|Max Barwyn|Joseph Bjorndahl|Maurice Cass|Robert Cauterio|Elsa Christian|Betty Ross Clarke|Guy D'Ennery|Abe Dinovitch|Billy Dooley|George Ernest|Jean Fenwick|Reinhardt Fraunfelder Jr.|Reinhardt Fraunfelder Sr.|Grace Goodall|Mary Howard|Lilyan Irene|Hazel Laughton|Max Lucke|Edwin Maxwell|Greta Meyer|Roger Moore|Anna Q. Nilsson|Jack Norton|Wedgwood Nowell|Tom Rutherford|Rolfe Sedan|George Sorel|Amzie Strickland|Louis Studer|Henry Sylvester|Minerva Urecal|Jacques Vanaire|Gustav von Seyffertitz|John Westerfelt|Florence Wix
title: Un romance para tres
